about_the_game:
• Brought to you by the team behind the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade
  • Embark on more than 50 plot-driven and character-focused missions from old friends gone awry to psychedelic dream conflicts
  • 5 vs 5 card battle keeps the game fast-paced, streamlined and strategically rewarding
  • ​​Customize your ship's hull with the Pilot Placement System to optimize your battle strategy and give your pilots the edge they need to win
  • Experience a personalized narrative depending on which Factions you support and relationships you build, making for engaging replays
  • More than 50 fully voiced characters to befriend



Lead a Ragtag Crew In This Narrative Card Battling RPG


As the Captain of the USS Zephyr, hunt for clues to turn the tide against the Frenzied swarm in this narratively-driven card-battling RPG. Directly impact the game’s narrative and cultivate a personalized adventure by strengthening your relationships with specialized Factions and their pilots. Each group features particular suit specialties with which you can construct your ideal deck and playstyle.

Your Cards Are Your Crew Members: Form Lasting Friendships with Your Team


Get to know your crew and manage your roster accordingly so you can strategically deploy them in battle according to their strengths and how they work together. Uncover the rich lives of the more than 50 fully voiced characters and learn what makes them tick.

Between epic card battles and plot-driven missions, you’ll form lasting friendships with those aboard your ship. Will you help a crew member resolve a familial issue, continue the hunt for alien Relic suits, or decide to work with your favorite Faction to gain their favor and aid?

Craft Mesmerizing Mecha Battle Suits to Fend Off Enemies


Upgrade your mechs and ship as you play, empowering you to defend against ruthless enemies in streamlined and mesmerizing 5 on 5 battles. Using spare parts and raw materials, craft custom builds, combos, and dazzling Mecha Battle Suits to hone your strategy and optimize powerful synergies.

Build your team your way! Focus on defense and armor your allies up, hunt down foes by marking them for extra damage, or attack with vigor, knocking out multiple enemies in an instant. Each build has potential for powerful combos and interactions.

Leverage and take advantage of the Pilot Placement System to put pilots in specific slots to strategically confer bonuses and intensify damage to your enemies. Your unique build and use of the Pilot Placement system lets you form your ideal strategy and maximize impact.

A Charming Anime-Inspired World to Explore


Enter into the hand-crafted Battle Suit Aces world, with thoughtful and stylish characters prepared to dazzle. With charming, vibrant art reminiscent of your favorite anime come to life, and an orchestral soundtrack, prepare to get lost in the whimsically warm atmosphere.

short_description: Lead a plucky crew against a star-consuming threat in this charming character-driven, card battling RPG. Brought to you by the creators of the award-winning Battle Chef Brigade, recruit ace pilots, upgrade their mecha Battle Suits, grow meaningful friendships and captain your personalized adventure.
